CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a specific material name mentioned in the paragraph. It stands for Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):Poly(styrenesulfonate) - P3HT:Poly(4-vinylbenzothiazole). It is a type of conducting polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PCDTBT: This is the material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of conducting polymer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a specific type of organic semiconductor material, which can be considered a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a particular material with distinct electrical and optical properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCDTBT: This organic semiconductor material has a specific property referred to as a "bandgap". The paragraph discusses efforts to lower this property without sacrificing another property, "high Voc" (voltage output capacity). Therefore, "bandgap" and "high Voc" are also relevant Property Name entities in this context.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| high Voc |
| PCDTBT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a specific type of organic semiconductor material, which can be considered a "Material" entity. However, in this context, it is being discussed in relation to its "Property Value" of having a "low bandgap" and "high Voc" (voltage at the open circuit).

So, "low bandgap" and "high Voc" are the desired "Property Values" of PCDTBT in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Low bandgap (Property Value of PCDTBT)
High Voc (Property Value of PCDTBT)
